title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a dataset in the dataset editor page of the query tab, the children nodes are not being listed.
EB: The children nodes should be listed when changing the data source. The expected result is that the new data source's children are listed.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Go to the dataset editor page in the query tab.
2. Change the data source for a dataset.
3. Check if the children nodes of the new data source are listed.
